description:
SharePoint surveys... they are great tools to create questionnaires, collect data from co-workers, or build e-learning modules.

If you are stressed about how you can create surveys, and collect the data, stop.

By the end of this course, you will be more comfortable creating surveys with SharePoint's easy to use, yet powerful survey building tool.

This course will help you create SharePoint surveys in no time at all.

Along with video content, step-by-step handouts will help you learn how to connect survey data to other Microsoft Office applications, like Excel, and Access. Also, learn how to create Views for your surveys.

This course is for anyone whose job responsibilities include working with SharePoint, and who wants to create a poll, track issues, gather information, or build a tool for in-depth research.

To ensure your success, knowledge of basic features of SharePoint, like site navigation, is recommended.

::

GAIN MICROSOFT SHAREPOINT SKILLS.

So Click The Take This Course Button On The Right & I'll See You In Class!
title: SharePoint 2010: Easily Create SharePoint Surveys in Minutes
